title: Roast honeyed parsnip wedges
description: Naturally sweet parsnips are enhanced by the addition of honey at the end of the roasting time. Try them with your favourite Sunday roast.

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Heat the milk in a large pan until just coming to the boil. Blanch the prepared parsnips in the milk for 2-3 minutes and drain well.

Transfer the parsnips to a roasting tray, season well and drizzle the oil over. Roast in the oven for 25-30 minutes until crisp and golden on the outside and cooked through. Drizzle the honey over in the last few minutes, tossing to coat. Serve at once.
